general.check_blog:
Before showing your stats we would like that you to check the names of the blogs associated with your account. We only take the first 20 characters of the name of his blog, here you can modify as you want to recognize them in our analysis platform.

Blogs associated with your account.
general.App: You reached the end point between the synchronization of your blog and Content Analytics. To finish this process you have to enter your access data in App, this way that user will be kept receiving data for analysis. Returning to authenticate could change this user, this process is automated if you start all over again planning another social data synchronization.
general.after: Once the plugin is installed and activated on your Wordpress, then it's time to schedule synchronization of social data from your blog.
